about_the_game:
Survivors offers a captivating gaming experience with simple gameplay infused with roguelite elements. Dive into 10 distinct runs within the game, each presenting a unique challenge as you confront a variety of enemies and powerful bosses. With every run, prepare to adapt to new obstacles and unleash your strategic prowess to overcome the ever-changing landscape of challenges.

Features

  • purchase items to enhance your character's abilities
  • Immersive first-person shooter experience with intense combat scenarios
  • fight different enemies and bosses
  • choose four different weapons, each with its own strengths and playstyle

short_description: "Survivors" is a first-person shooter roguelite experience. Armed with four weapons, engage in intense battles against diverse enemies, confront bosses, and strive to survive until the end. Making choices among items and enhancing your character's capabilities through purchases in the shop.
